entry.summary: RTâ€‚Manny (ðŸ§±,ðŸš€) Remixing this. I went from working at a large agency working with big name clients, to working on crypto projects, to joining @developer_dao, started helping people more and more, and then ultimately jumped into devrel and I loved it. Not easy but rewarding. 7+ months in devrel rahat.eth:â€‚Just reflecting on the last few years - I went from Frontend Engineering to founding failed startups - back to frontend engineering this time in web3. Then ultimately jumped into devrel and I've loved it. Been almost 9 months here.
